metadata.name: 3FACE Master Production Canvas
metadata.description:
3FACE Master Production Canvas is an ongoing digital drawing that documents the totality of 3FACE production: ideation, archetype explorations, prototypes, forking paths, team explainers, logo designs, notes to self, marginalia, secrets. 


Every time I needed to work out something about 3FACE, I worked it out  on this digital canvas. 


This is a dynamic 1/1 NFT artwork. It is subject to additive updates as 3FACE production evolves. 


Canvas snapshot #1: 8/16/2022. 6103 x 4780px. Lossless PNG.


For more about the 3FACE project, visit 3face.fit
